node.title: 'Everyone just had tears of joy': Joyful Carnarvon locals celebrate Cleo Smith's return
node.alt: A sign says 'welcome home cleo, thankyou WA police'
node.description: Celebrations are in full swing in Carnarvon as locals breathe a collective sigh of relief over the safe return of Cleo Smith, who was found alive this morning after vanishing from the Blowholes campgroundsÂ more than two weeks ago.
node.content:
["The Carnarvon community breathed a collective sigh of relief, with some crying tears of joy as\u00a0Cleo Smith was reunited with her family.\u00a0", "The quiet north-west WA town, with a population of about\u00a05,000, was thrown into the spotlight 18 days ago when the little girl disappeared from her tent at the popular Blowholes campgrounds.\u00a0", "Local resident\u00a0Leticia Andreoli \u2014\u00a0whose son is in Cleo's class at St Mary Star of the Sea Catholic School \u2014\u00a0said there was happiness on the streets of Carnarvon today.", "\"Walking around town, it feels like this cloud has been lifted,\" she said.", "", "
Carnarvon local\u00a0Leticia Andreoli\u00a0is thrilled that Cleo Smith has been found.\u00a0(ABC News)
", "\"Being in town over the last two-and-a half-weeks has been pretty dismal. You could feel the atmosphere of everybody feeling really sad and concerned.", "\"It's an absolutely amazing feeling in town today.\"", "The school's principal, Steve O'Halloran, said their community was \"beyond relieved\" to hear the news.\u00a0", "\"Every member of our school community\u00a0shares my feelings of gratitude for this outcome,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"We will continue to pray for Cleo and her family, with respect for their dignity and privacy\u00a0as they process this event and as the investigation continues.\"", "", "
The principal of Cleo's school says\u00a0their community are\u00a0\"beyond relieved\"\u00a0she has\u00a0been found by\u00a0police.\u00a0(Facebook: Ellie Smith)
", "
Tears of joy\u00a0at local pub
", "At the Carnarvon Hotel, locals are raising a glass to Cleo's return.", "Jessica Fernihough said balloons are being put up around town to celebrate.", "", "
Jessica Fernihough is\u00a0among locals celebrating Cleo's safe return at the Carnarvon Hotel.(ABC News: Jessica Warriner)
", "\"Everyone just had tears of joy. Your heart skips a beat. [We're]\u00a0just so relieved,\" she\u00a0said.", "Ms Fernihough said it was impossible to go on social media without seeing posts about the four-year-old.", "\"Whether it was in Carnarvon, Perth, Exmouth, Geraldton, even people who don't live in Western Australia. You've just seen so much joy, so many comments,\" she said.", "
'The best news to wake up to'
", "Helicopter pilot and Carnarvon local Dave Amman dropped everything to search for Cleo from the sky when she went missing.", "He and his coworkers at Coral Coast Helicopters suspended operations to search \"as low, far and wide\" as they could.", "Mr Amman told ABC Radio Perth the four-year-old had been the only thing on locals' minds for the past 18 days and that news of her discovery was overwhelming.", "\"I saw all the news articles pop up when I woke up early this morning.\u00a0I thought it was fake at first,\" he said.", "The local SES unit \u2014\u00a0which\u00a0spent days involved in the land search for Cleo, along with units from Kalbarri, Shark Bay, Eneabba, Geraldton and Exmouth \u2014\u00a0was jubilant.", "\"The best news to wake up to this morning,\" SES Carnarvon posted on social media.", "\"We are so relieved for her family.\"", "
Shire President 'speechless' when he heard news
", "Shire President Eddie Smith was lost for words when news of her rescue broke.", "\"I'm a bit speechless.\u00a0I'm trying to get my head around the fact she's been found,\" he told ABC Radio's AM program.", "\"It'll take a bit to absorb, everybody's been so worried and concerned.", "\"It's absolutely fantastic. It's wonderful.\"", "ABC Radio Perth Mornings host Nadia Mitsopoulos said a listener texted in a photo of an\u00a0road sign, emblazoned with the words : 'Welcome Home Cleo'.", "For Ms Andreoli's young son, like so many others, the news is still sinking in.", "\"Last night before bed, he said,\u00a0'Oh Mummy, Cleo's lost',\" she said.\u00a0", "\"He goes: 'Maybe we'll find her' and I said,\u00a0'I hope so, Baby'.", "\"Then, this morning, we wake up, and she's been found.\u00a0", "\"It took him a while to get it.", "\"She's going to get lots of hugs and lots of love from her school friends, her family and the whole community.\""]
